entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
